Maths

Some really basic Vanilla Javascript maths functions

Things to note

  • Have used const instead of var for variables as this seems best practise for my needs (ES2015).
  • Each component is within its own container and has its own script for control, just to keep things separate.

Number to square

Takes a number as an input and multiples it by itself

Number to cube

Takes a number as an input and multiples it by itself and again
